aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: At your service for over 75 years

team.title: Our Team
team.intro: Competent advisors in Ostrhauderfehn for motor equipment and cleaning technology. Professional consultation, qualified workshops and comprehensive service.

store.title: Our Store
store.tagline: If you can't find it here, you don't really need it!
store.intro: Expert advice in spacious sales areas on the latest market developments.

qmf.title: QMF-Certified Dealer
qmf.headline: We are a QMF-certified specialist dealer!
qmf.desc1: QMF is an industry qualification initiative for service-oriented specialist retailers, launched by trade associations BuFa-MOT and VdM and supported by most specialist-focused suppliers.
qmf.desc2: The goal is to optimize consumer consulting based on established criteria and ensure consumer protection and safety through qualified product training.
qmf.desc3: Members commit to meeting quality standards with regular audits, receiving the seal: QMF® - Qualified Power Equipment Specialist Dealer.

kaercher.title: Authorized Kärcher Dealer
kaercher.headline: We are an authorized Kärcher dealer!
kaercher.desc: We distribute the complete range of the globally leading provider of cleaning systems and cleaning products: KÄRCHER.

faq.bikeServiceQuestion: How often should my bike be serviced?
faq.bikeServiceAnswer: We recommend an annual service or after approx. 2,000 km. More frequently with intensive use.
faq.repairTimeQuestion: How long does a repair take?
faq.repairTimeAnswer: Minor repairs are often completed the same day. Larger jobs usually take 2-5 working days.
faq.warrantyQuestion: What warranty is there on repairs?
faq.warrantyAnswer: We provide a 6-month warranty on our repair work. Installed spare parts are covered by the manufacturer's warranty.
faq.openingHoursAnswer: Monday to Friday 8am–1pm and 2pm–6pm, Saturday 9am–1pm. In winter (Nov 1–Feb 1) we close at 5pm on weekdays.
faq.costQuestion: How much does a service cost?
faq.costAnswer: A standard service starts from 49 EUR incl. VAT. The exact price depends on an on-site assessment.

products.title: Products
products.aiError: The AI advisor is currently unavailable.

categoryService.needHelpDescription: Our expert team is happy to assist you.
categoryService.aiCantHelp: If our AI can't help you, open a ticket and our team will personally take care of your request.
categoryService.bikeDescription: Inspections, repairs and consultation for all bike types — from city bikes to e-bikes.

bikeFaq.inspectionQuestion: How often should my bike be serviced?
bikeFaq.inspectionAnswer: We recommend an annual service or after approx. 2,000 km. More frequently for e-bikes and intensive use.
bikeFaq.eBikeAnswer: Yes, we specialize in all major e-bike systems (Bosch, Shimano, Brose). Battery diagnostics and software updates are part of our standard service.
bikeFaq.repairQuestion: How long does a bike repair take?
bikeFaq.repairAnswer: Minor repairs like tire changes are often done the same day. Larger jobs take 2-5 business days.
bikeFaq.leasingAnswer: Yes, we offer company bike leasing through various providers. Contact us for an individual quote.

categoryService.cleaningDescription: Maintenance, repair and consultation for pressure washers, vacuum cleaners, steam cleaners and sweepers.

cleaningFaq.maintenanceQuestion: How often should a pressure washer be serviced?
cleaningFaq.maintenanceAnswer: We recommend annual maintenance for regular use. Every 6 months for commercial use.
cleaningFaq.repairAnswer: Yes, we repair cleaning equipment from all major brands including Kärcher, Nilfisk, Stihl and many more.
cleaningFaq.accessoriesQuestion: Do you have accessories and spare parts?
cleaningFaq.accessoriesAnswer: We carry an extensive range of original accessories and spare parts. Parts not in stock are ordered within 2-3 business days.
cleaningFaq.warrantyQuestion: What warranty is there on repairs?
cleaningFaq.warrantyAnswer: We provide a 6-month warranty on our repair work. Installed spare parts are covered by the manufacturer's warranty.

categoryService.motorDescription: Service and repair for lawn mowers, chainsaws, hedge trimmers, brush cutters and leaf blowers.

motorFaq.maintenanceQuestion: When should I have my lawn mower serviced?
motorFaq.maintenanceAnswer: Ideally at the start of the season in spring. We offer a complete spring check including oil change, spark plug and blade sharpening.
motorFaq.winterAnswer: Yes, we offer a winterization service for all motor equipment — including fuel system care and proper storage.
motorFaq.repairQuestion: How long does a chainsaw repair take?
motorFaq.repairAnswer: Standard repairs like chain replacement or carburetor adjustment are often done the same day. Major repairs take 3-7 business days.
motorFaq.safetyAnswer: Yes, we check all safety-relevant parts and ensure your equipment meets current safety standards.

repairs.readyForPickupDesc: Your repair is complete. Please confirm that you have been informed and will pick up your device soon.
repairs.patienceNote: Please understand that waiting times may occur. We handle every order with the utmost care.
repairs.repairPatienceNote: Please understand that repair duration depends on the availability of spare parts and the complexity of the damage.

aiChat.tutorialIntro: Our AI assistant helps you with questions about your equipment. Follow these steps for the best answer:
aiChat.tutorialStep1: Describe what it's about (e.g. e-bike, pressure washer, lawn mower)
aiChat.tutorialStep2: Mention the brand and model if possible
aiChat.tutorialStep3: Describe the problem or your question as precisely as possible
aiChat.tutorialRepairHint: If special tools are needed, the AI will recommend a repair at our shop — including appointment scheduling.
aiChat.emptySubtitle: Ask your question and get an expert answer right away.
aiChat.escalated: You have been connected with an employee. A ticket has been created.

aiChat.title: AI Assistant
aiChat.subtitle: Ask your question and get instant help

legal.disclaimer: All information is placeholder and must be reviewed by a lawyer.

agb.title: Terms and Conditions
agb.subtitle: Wilken Poelker GmbH & Co. KG, Ostrhauderfehn
agb.section1Content:
These T&C apply to all contracts concluded via www.wilkenpoelker.de.

Seller: Wilken Poelker GmbH & Co. KG, Langholter Straße 43, 26842 Ostrhauderfehn.

Internet offers are non-binding. Binding offers submitted in text form (email) are valid for 5 days. Email processing is automated; customers must verify correct email addresses.

The seller acts as commissionaire for some goods (third-party ownership).
agb.section2Content: The website and mobile app meet barrier-free access requirements per BFSGV. AI tools are used to support accessibility for various disabilities. Information is available via the accessibility declaration.
agb.section3Content:
Internet offers are non-binding. Binding offers in text form (email) are valid for 5 days. Email processing is automated.

The seller acts as commissionaire for some goods (third-party ownership).
agb.section4Content:
Internet offers for courses are non-binding. Binding offers in text form (email) are valid for 5 days.

Minimum participant requirements specified in offers. Cancellation notice: 7 days before start if minimums unmet. Refunds issued immediately if course doesn't occur. Instructor absence: refund or rescheduling.
agb.section5Content: Replacement attendees allowed anytime before course start without additional costs.
agb.section6Content:
Performance per service description specifications. Scheduled delivery dates apply. Customer obligation: accessible premises, electrical/water provision.

Cancellation terms: 10% flat fee if work not started (post-withdrawal period only).
agb.section7Content:
Work performed per service description to best ability. Customer describes defect and provides equipment. Customer covers shipping to seller.

Timeline: 5-7 days post-arrival (after payment if prepaid).

Cancellation: 10% flat fee if work not begun (post-withdrawal period).
agb.section8Content:
Lien rights limited to claims from same contract. Goods remain seller property until full payment.

Enterprise-specific: extended retention over all relationship claims.
agb.section9Content:
Statutory warranty rights apply. Used goods: 1-year warranty if expressly agreed before purchase.

Exceptions: personal injury damages, gross negligence, fraudulent concealment.

Consumer must inspect promptly and report damage/defects quickly.

Enterprise customers: 1-year warranty; seller chooses repair or replacement.
agb.section10Content:
Deposit charged if specified in offer. Deposit waived if matching used part provided before shipment. Refund within 30 days of receiving acceptable used part.

Used part requirements: undamaged housing, original packaging, complete original components. Customer bears shipping costs and risk; unpaid packages refused.
agb.section11Content: German law applies (consumer-favorable provisions preserved). Fulfillment location and court jurisdiction: seller's seat (unless consumer). UN purchase law excluded.
agb.section12Content:
Wilken Poelker GmbH & Co. KG, Langholter Straße 43, 26842 Ostrhauderfehn
Tel: 04952-5304 | Email: info@wilkenpoelker.de

Not participating in consumer arbitration.

Contract language: German. Full contract text not stored by seller. Pre-submission: customers can print/save via browser. Post-submission: order data resent via email.

Prices are total (all taxes included). Shipping costs separate unless free shipping promised. Payment methods shown on website or in offer.

Delivery conditions available via website or offer. Consumer risk: transfers upon handover. Enterprise risk: customer assumes during shipment.

EU Online Dispute Resolution platform: https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/

datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.subtitle: Information pursuant to Art. 13 and 14 GDPR
datenschutz.section1Content:
Responsible for data processing:

Wilken Poelker GmbH & Co. KG
Langholter Straße 43
26842 Ostrhauderfehn
Germany

Phone: 04952 5304
Email: info@wilkenpoelker.de

Data Protection Officer: IITR Datenschutz GmbH, Dr. Sebastian Kraska, Munich
Email: datenschutz@wilkenpoelker.de
Phone: 089–18917360
datenschutz.section2Content:
Server Logs: IP address, access dates/times, page names, data volume, and provider information collected during website visits. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR.

Contact Forms & Email: Name, email address, message text. Pre-contractual inquiries: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR. Other inquiries: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR with right to object.

Job Applications: Contact details, qualifications, certifications. Processing per Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR with § 26(1) BDSG. Special categories (disability status): Art. 9(2)(b) GDPR. Retention max. six months.

Orders/Purchases: Personal data for contract fulfillment (names, addresses, payment/shipping info). Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR. Data shared with shipping providers, payment processors, IT vendors.
datenschutz.section3Content:
Technical Cookies: Deployed for functionality without separate consent. Legal basis: § 25(2) TDDDG and Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR.

Google Analytics 4: Analyzes website usage, visitor behavior, marketing performance. Collects: IP address, page views, click paths, device info, location data. IP addresses shortened within EU/EEA. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR (consent).

Google Ads Conversion Tracking: Tracks ad clicks and page conversions using limited-validity cookies. No personal identification possible.

Google Remarketing: Analyzes visitor behavior for interest-based ad display on Google Display Network.

Google Maps: Embedded map functionality collects visitor data during page load.

YouTube: Videos embedded in enhanced privacy mode (no data stored unless video watched).

Data transferred to USA under Trans-Atlantic Data Privacy Framework (TADPF).
datenschutz.section4Content:
Postal Advertising: Name and address from purchase history used for direct mail. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR. Right to object available.

Newsletter: Email address collected via explicit opt-in. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR. Unsubscribe available in each newsletter.

Email Direct Marketing: Similar goods/services promoted to customers who haven't objected. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR.

Shipping Status Notifications: Email address shared with logistics partners with explicit consent. Revocable consent option.
datenschutz.section5Content:
Access: Request information about processed personal data.

Correction: Modify inaccurate data.

Deletion: Request erasure under statutory conditions.

Restrict Processing: Limit how data is used.

Data Portability: Receive data in portable format.

Object: Withdraw consent or object to Art. 6(1)(f) processing anytime.

Complaint: File grievances with supervisory authority.
datenschutz.section6Content:
Lower Saxony Data Protection Commissioner
Prinzenstraße 5, 30159 Hannover
Phone: +49 511 1204500
Email: poststelle@lfd.niedersachsen.de
datenschutz.section7Content:
ERP System: TAIFUN Software AG, Joachimstraße 2, 30159 Hannover. Order data processed for contract fulfillment. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR.

Firebase Cloud Messaging: Google LLC, USA. Used for delivering push notifications to the mobile app. Data transfer to USA under the Trans-Atlantic Data Privacy Framework (TADPF). Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(f) and Art. 28 GDPR.

Sentry: Functional Software Inc., USA. Used for error tracking and crash reporting in the mobile app to identify and fix technical issues. Data transfer to USA under applicable transfer mechanisms. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(f) and Art. 28 GDPR.

Render.com: Hosting provider for the backend infrastructure. Server and application data processed within their infrastructure. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(f) and Art. 28 GDPR.

Cloudinary: Image storage and optimization service. Profile pictures and service request attachments are stored and processed via Cloudinary. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(f) and Art. 28 GDPR.
datenschutz.section8Content:
Post-contract: retained during warranty periods, then per statutory tax/commercial retention requirements. Deleted afterward unless further processing consent provided.

Contact inquiries: deleted after response unless further consent given.

Applications: six months maximum unless candidate pool consent exists.
datenschutz.section9Content:
For questions about data protection or to exercise your rights, please contact:

Wilken Poelker GmbH & Co. KG
Data Protection
Langholter Straße 43
26842 Ostrhauderfehn

Email: datenschutz@wilkenpoelker.de
Phone: 04952 5304

Data Protection Officer: IITR Datenschutz GmbH
Dr. Sebastian Kraska
Email: datenschutz@wilkenpoelker.de
Phone: 089–18917360
datenschutz.section10Content:
When using our mobile app, the following additional data may be processed:

Push Notification Tokens: When you enable push notifications, a device-specific token is generated and transmitted via Firebase Cloud Messaging (Google LLC) and Expo Push Notification Service. This token is used exclusively for delivering notifications to your device. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR (consent).

Camera and Photo Gallery Access: The app may request access to your device camera and photo gallery to enable you to upload profile pictures and attach photos to service requests. Images are only accessed and transmitted with your explicit action. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(a) and Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR.

Device Identifiers: Technical device identifiers may be processed to ensure reliable notification delivery and to prevent duplicate notifications. These identifiers are not used for tracking purposes beyond notification functionality. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR.

impressum.representedByValue: Personally liable partner: Wilken Poelker Verwaltungs- und Beteiligungs GmbH, registered at Local Court Aurich, HRB 110649, represented by managing director Clemens Poelker
impressum.contentResponsibleValue: Clemens Poelker (address as above), pursuant to § 18 para. 2 MStV
impressum.supervisoryAuthorityValue: Lower Saxony State Media Authority (NLM), Seelhorststraße 18, 30175 Hannover
impressum.disputeResolutionText: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS): https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/. We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
impressum.disclaimerText: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.
impressum.appDevelopmentText: This app was designed, developed and implemented by HyoukaCreativeStudio. All rights to the software, source code, design and technical implementation belong to HyoukaCreativeStudio. Unauthorized reproduction, distribution or modification of this app or parts thereof is not permitted without express written permission from HyoukaCreativeStudio.

widerrufsrecht.title: Right of Withdrawal
widerrufsrecht.subtitle: Your right to cancel
widerrufsrecht.section1Content: Consumers have 14 days to withdraw without providing reasons, calculated from the date goods are received (or the last item if delivered separately).
widerrufsrecht.section2Content:
Notify us via unambiguous declaration:

Wilken Poelker GmbH & Co. KG
Langholter Straße 43
26842 Ostrhauderfehn

Phone: 04952 - 5304
Email: info@wilkenpoelker.de

By postal mail, fax, or email. A sample form is provided but not mandatory.

The deadline is met if notification is sent before expiration.
widerrufsrecht.section3Content: We must refund all payments within 14 days of receiving withdrawal notice, using the original payment method. No fees apply to consumers for returns.
widerrufsrecht.section4Content:
Consumers pay direct costs for returning package-able goods. Non-package-able items are collected at our expense.

Return deadline: 14 days from withdrawal notification.

Cost estimate for non-package-able returns: approximately €50 maximum.
widerrufsrecht.section5Content:
No withdrawal right for:

• Custom-made or personalized goods
• Perishable items
• Sealed health/hygiene products once opened
• Alcoholic beverages with agreed prices
• Newspapers, magazines, periodicals (excluding subscriptions)
• Items mixed inseparably with other goods post-delivery
• Opened sealed audio/video/software packages
widerrufsrecht.section6Content:
To: Wilken Poelker GmbH & Co. KG, Langholter Straße 43, 26842 Ostrhauderfehn, Email: info@wilkenpoelker.de

I/We (*) hereby give notice that I/We (*) withdraw from my/our (*) contract of sale of the following goods (*)/for the provision of the following service (*),

Ordered on (*)/received on (*):

Name of consumer(s):

Address of consumer(s):

Signature of consumer(s) (only if this form is notified on paper):

Date:

(*) Delete as appropriate.
